data.text: @MxTinVegas Keep them close. I find myself often looking at them & remembering the good times. I truly believe that their spirits walk with us, guide us & in their own way, talk to us.

@EvanTeaches11 He was driving long haul when he got sick. My kids and I have been talking about agriculture and how imp the infrastructure is to Geo. So he was already on my mind. I miss the pictures he used to take of the landscape as he travelled.
@MxTinVegas I’m sorry, it never gets easier, you just learn to sit with it longer.
@MxTinVegas Just keep on talking to the sky. If he resides in your heart, he lives on…
@MxTinVegas I am so sorry for your loss. https://t.co/j67rkgHldE
@MxTinVegas I am so sorry, my friend.
@MxTinVegas I am just so very, very sorry.
@MxTinVegas I’m so sorry for your loss. May his memory always be a blessing to you 🦋
@MxTinVegas I’m so sorry of your loss. May the Most High grant you peace
